name: Simple Lead Generation
author: SANDIGITAL, LLC.

sections.description:
Really Simple WordPress Lead Capture Plugin. While editing post, you can add form with this plugin to capture information. For pro version more field is supported and layout can be choosing.

Arbitrary section 1
sections.installation:
1. Upload LeadGenerationPlugin folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Lead Generation’ menu in WordPress
  3. Create new post and click rSimplePLX button to create new lead generation.
sections.faq:
A question that someone might have

An answer to that question.
